reviewText: My mathematics tutor is Susan Smith she is such a great teacher, highly recomended!
My painting tutor Daniel Duncan was a rip off, do not hire him
My physics tutor Alex Cooper was quiet knowledgeble and encouraging
My grammar tutor Isabel Gomez was great
Do not hire singing tutor Adele Curran she is so impatient and doesnt care
My mathematics tutor was a waste of money
My daughter really improved her grades with science tutor Jasmin Lopez
Very Happy with Lorain Doe English lessons
Katherine Johns the best ballet tutor ever!
My confidence about statistics is gone through the window, never call tutor Gabby Wales
